messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Impulsive decisions vs thought out (A Drug Problem
messages.msgSnippet: ... about ... My dh put some hinge thingys on the door to make ours close automatically. They went out after a couple of years of use and now we all have to
messages.messageBody:
> What about some automatic closer for the door? If money's tight, what
about
> designing something with a weight and pulley?
>
>

My dh put some hinge thingys on the door to make ours close automatically.
They went
out after a couple of years of use and now we all have to remember to close
the door.
It was nice when the door would just swing shut by itself (of course I can't
tell you how
many times the door didn't shut all the way and we would come home and the
dog
would be in the house LOL). Anyhow, it was and still would be a very good
solution
to keeping the door closed as it appears my entire family was born in a
barn, myself included <g>.

Kathy
